content: 2dc in ch2 space ch2 skip next stitch then double_crochet in next stitch** repeat from * to ** five times omitting final double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning double_crochet 60 double_crochet 6 ch2 6 ch1 78 stitches in total 7 slip_stitch into next stitch then ch3 *double_crochet in next three stitches double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 and skip next stitch double_crochet in next three stitches 2dc in next stitch and 2dc in ch2 space ch2 skip next stitch then double_crochet in next stitch** repeat from * to ** five times omitting final double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning double_crochet 72 double_crochet 6 ch2 6 ch1 90 stitches in total 8 slip_stitch into next stitch then ch3 *double_crochet in next three stitches double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 and skip next stitch double_crochet in next five stitches 2dc in next stitch and 2dc in ch2 space ch2 skip next stitch then double_crochet in next stitch** repeat from * to ** five times omitting final double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning double_crochet 84 double_crochet 6 ch2 6 ch1 102 stitches in total 9 slip_stitch into next stitch then ch3 *double_crochet in next three stitches double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 and skip next stitch double_crochet in next five stitches ch1 and skip next stitch double_crochet in next stitch 2dc in next stitch and 2dc in ch2 space ch2 skip next stitch then double_crochet in next stitch** repeat from * to ** five times omitting final double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning double_crochet 90 double_crochet 6 ch2 12 ch1 114 stitches in total 10 slip_stitch into next stitch then ch3 *double_crochet in next three stitches double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 and skip next stitch double_crochet in next five stitches ch1 and skip next stitch as many times as necessary until there are four stitches left before the next ch2 space double_crochet in next three stitches 2dc in next stitch and 2dc in ch2 space ch2 skip next stitch then double_crochet in next stitch** repeat from * to ** five times omitting final double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning double_crochet for round 10 102 double_crochet 6 ch2 12 ch1 126 stitches in total note the fifth double_crochet of double_crochet in next five stitches will be worked into a ch1 space page 2 of 4 spin me around © catherine bligh 11 slip_stitch into next stitch then ch3
